review.comment: I contacted Attorney Geerdes after my sister suddenly passed away from cancer. I realized that I had procrastinated long enough on creating an estate plan for my family. I googled estate planning attorneys in the area and Attorney Geerdes' practice caught my eye, particularly because of the estate planning seminars she gives each week. I filled out a contact form for her and another attorney that I also found on Google. Attorney Geerdes' office called me the next day! I didn't hear back from the other attorney for 3 weeks. That was the first sign that I was in good hands. Within a week, we began our Zoom estate planning calls with Attorney Geerdes, and about a month later we were in her office signing our trust documents. During this time, I continued to research trusts and estate planning documents, to make sure that we were covering all our bases in the consultations with Attorney Geerdes. I was relieved to see that the list of documents she prepared for us, was the same as I found in my research. In addition to the legal advice and documents prepared and filed through her office, Attorney Geerdes and her team were very patient with me. I was nervous about this process, as it was a new experience for me, and I felt vulnerable sharing information about my assets and trusting her to do what was necessary to protect them. I made several changes throughout the process and not once did Attorney Geerdes or her team seem annoyed or frustrated. Their patience further reinforced my decision to work with their practice and refer others to them. I'm sure they work with a lot of clients with way more assets than mine to protect, but they didn't make me feel any less important or valued as their client. Thank you Attorney Geerdes and team!
Holly prepared a trust for me. She did a very good job. Her service fee is affordable. Highly recommended.
It's a good place for consulting
I attended the complimentary two hour seminar and it was time well spent.  The class was informative and Ms. Geerdes was personable and knowledegable.  I highly recommend attending this seminar.
i attended the workshop yesterday. i learned a lot, esp about trusts; also about the dangers of not planning. i recommend this workshop to all.

I went to the Estate Planning Workshop and after two hours felt very educated about estate planning.  The class was well put together and I realized that my asset protection plan was lacking.  I scheduled a one on one meeting with Holly and it didn’t take long for me to realize that I needed her services.  She is extremely knowledgeable, accomplished and dedicated to providing a well needed service.   I visited her office three times and never waited more than five minutes to see her.  She is a professional and I felt that I was in good hands form the start.  It was money well spent and I have recommended friends and family members.

I absolutely ,absolutely Love this Workshop .
I've alot of unanswered questions ,After I lost my mom 1 month less 4 years.
Will certainly recommended this workshop to everyone.
Looking forward to my one on one appointment.
Only drawback is , the time went by so fast.
Attorney Holly Geerdes, You Were Great.
Glad you were able to conduct this Workshop .

To tell the Truth, you deserve  10  Stars.
(Awesome )

It was Worth the distance .

Thanks ,
Marva Martin
